fig,axs = plt.subplots(2,1,figsize=(25,10))

tmp = data.groupby('STATE').count().reset_index().sort_values('NAME',ascending=False)[['STATE','NAME']].iloc[:10]
tmp.columns = ['STATE','NUMBER']
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='STATE',y='NUMBER',ax=axs[0])
axs[0].set_title('Top 10 number of prison in state')

tmp = data.groupby('CITY').count().reset_index().sort_values('NAME',ascending=False)[['CITY','NAME']].iloc[:50]
tmp.columns = ['CITY','NUMBER']
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='CITY',y='NUMBER',ax=axs[1])
axs[1].set_title('Top 50 number of prison in city')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)

plt.show()

fig,axs = plt.subplots(2,1,figsize=(25,10))

tmp = data.groupby('STATE').sum().reset_index().sort_values('CAPACITY',ascending=False)[['STATE','CAPACITY']].iloc[:10]
tmp.columns = ['STATE','CAPACITY']
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='STATE',y='CAPACITY',ax=axs[0])
axs[0].set_title('Top 10 sum of prison capacity in state')

tmp = data.groupby('CITY').sum().reset_index().sort_values('CAPACITY',ascending=False)[['CITY','CAPACITY']].iloc[:50]
tmp.columns = ['CITY','CAPACITY']

axs[1].set_title('Top 50 sum of prison capacity in city')
